reviews.review_msg: Great professor in terms of grading criteria and teaching, the exams are straightforward and she tells you what's on the exam. The only issue is that she is NOT accessible outside of class, has a very strict emailing criteria and even following that would not get you any responses back which is very rude.

She's very nice and courteous in lecture, but don't ever go by her office (considering she's the MBB advisor and all) she'll snap your head off!  Teaching is cool, makes sure you know what she's looking for and her lectures well organized (lots info tho)
